title: Wifes phone has problems closing apps
content:
Ever since my wife updated her Google Pixel 3 to Android 10, she's been finding that she has to swipe up 2-4 times to close apps sometimes.
she will swipe up to close the app, the app will disappear, but the next time she opens the task switcher, the app is still open.
She's demonstrated this to me with Google Chrome, and Instagram.
